select DEPT_CODE, COLL_CODE, HALL_CODE, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_TEL, DEPT_TUITION, DEPT_ROOM from department

select d.DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, SUB_CODE, s.DEPT_CODE, SUB_SORT, SUB_NAME, SUB_CREDIT, SUB_LEC_TIME, SUB_PRAC_TIME, SUB_OUTLINE_KO, SUB_OUTLINE_EN, SUB_TYPE from SUBJECT s inner join DEPARTMENT d on s.DEPT_CODE = d.DEPT_CODE where 1=1
